title: Omtool Renews Focus on Legal Market and Announces Enhanced Solutions to Automate Document Workflows
text:
Submitted by admin on 8/31/2015 @ 2:30 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Omtool 
ANDOVER, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Omtool™, Ltd. (OMTL.PK), the trusted provider of document capture, fax and workflow solutions, has enhanced its software offering to include solutions for records scanning and intellectual property documents handling to ensure its legal customer base continues to have an optimized document capture experience. The company will highlight these solutions at the Annual ILTACON event in Las Vegas, NV. 
Omtool AccuRoute for legal offers on-demand document capture and workflow solutions with the full-featured, enterprise-class infrastructure demanded by the world’s largest firms. With offerings designed to fit law firms of all sizes, Omtool’s solutions integrate with virtually any legal communication or IT system, offering a streamlined user experience. With mobility also at the forefront of many firms, organizations need solutions to help them share, collaborate and store files readily and securely. 
During the annual ILTA Conference, Omtool will showcase their solutions for records scanning and intellectual property (IP) document handling. This comes just after last week’s announcement of Omtool’s partnership with NetDocuments to provide the document capture and paper onramp into NetDocuments. Omtool will be demonstrating this as well as their full suite of legal solutions. 
Records scanning continues to be a central focus as firms seek to reduce costs associated with storing hard copy documents on premises or at third-party document housing facilities. Benefits of using AccuRoute to digitize records include: Lower on-site storage costs by digitizing records Saving time and increasing productivity with on-demand scanning, capture and fax Creating a single document of record by integrating paper and electronic media. Providing immediate accessibility to document images long after they are sent to record storage 
With a focus on records scanning initiatives in advance of an office move, Omtool has seen one firm save over $1 million through reduced storage requirements, real-estate costs and the reduction of filing systems required to house paper-based records. 
“The AccuRoute solution provides law firms like ours, with a world-class infrastructure to address all of our organizations’ document conversion and scanning needs. We’re able to handle thousands of documents with minimal effort, increasing user productivity and reducing costs involved with document-intensive legal workflows, ” said Jared Korte, Director, Applications, Kirkland & Ellis LLP. “The value we’ve received as a result of this implementation continues to pay dividends to the business. We continue to identify other areas of the business that could benefit from this solution.” 
Firms that need to improve accessibility, increase security, and streamline business process workflows related to front and back office operations can also use AccuRoute to simplify the handling of sensitive intellectual property documents. The ability to quickly deliver IP documents and correspondence to the fee earners responsible for the filing can shorten response time and client satisfaction at the same time as effectively tracking and managing those documents within the firm. 
“For more than 20 years we have been a respected leader in the document capture software market and have honed our expertise in the legal industry. As on-demand capture becomes a pervasive infrastructure within firms, we continue to expand with new solutions for legal-specific processes,” said Karen Cummings, Executive Vice President, Sales and Marketing, Omtool. “We take pride in our ability to stay in lock-step with the needs of this market. Our solutions are driven by legal clients for the legal market. “ 
As validated by the partnership between Omtool and NetDocuments, Omtool continues to prove its commitment to the legal market by offering new, user-focused solutions driven by its legal base of clients. This integration will be showcased during demonstrations at booth #408/410 and during one-on-one sessions in Omtool’s Solutions Suite. 
For more information or to schedule a private meeting with an Omtool solution specialist at ILTA, Omtool may be contacted at: http://go.omtool.com/ILTA15 . 
About Omtool 
Omtool (PINK: OMTL) is a trusted partner for document capture, fax and workflow solutions. The company designs and builds software solutions that serve as the foundation for secure document process automation for clients that include some of the world’s largest financial institutions, hundreds of healthcare providers and legal firms, and companies across virtually every industry. By partnering with Omtool, our clients reduce the costs, complexity, compliance risks, and environmental footprints associated with critical business processes that involve paper and electronic documents. Based in Andover, Mass., with offices in the United Kingdom, Omtool can be contacted at 1-800-886-7845 or at http://www.omtool.com/ .
